FuncDef: The display local-key-pair public command displays the public key information in the specified local key pair.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays the public key in the local DSA key pair.
-

Displays the public key in the local ECC key pair.
-

Displays the public key in the local RSA key pair.
-

ExtraInfo: To display information about the public key in the specified key pair of the device functioning as an SSH client, run the display local-key-pair public command. Then, manually copy the displayed information to the server to enable the server to authenticate users and permit the login requests of authorized users.
